title: "final-dashboard-project"
---

```{r, echo = FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(plotly)
library(janitor)

accessories <- read_csv("data/accessories.csv")

accessories <- accessories %>%
  clean_names()

```

```{r, echo = FALSE}
#| title: scatter plot
p1 <- ggplot(data = accessories, aes(x = name, y = buy)) +
  geom_point()

ggplotly(p1)
```

```{r, echo = FALSE}
#| title: bar chart

p2 <- ggplot(data = accessories, aes(x = name, y = buy)) +
  geom_bar(stat="identity") +
  theme(axis,title.x = element_text(angle = 45, vjust = .5, hjust = 1))

ggplotly(p2)
```

```{r, echo = FALSE}
#| title: table

accessories <- accessories %>%
  select(-buy)

knitr::kable(accessories)
```
